programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.sub-title: Kool Deadwood Nights 23
programme.desc: "My Classic Car" is a television program that captures America's love affair with the automobile.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.sub-title: Alan Mann GT40
programme.desc: Dennis travels to the American Muscle Car Museum and fires up the Alan Mann GT40.

programme.desc: Dennis travels to Arizona for the Tucson Classics Car Show.

programme.sub-title: Lincoln Mark VII and Cadillac Seville
programme.desc: Caring for classic automobiles.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.sub-title: Cruisin' the Coast

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.sub-title: Shelby vs. Syclone Trucks
programme.desc: Dennis travels to the American Muscle Car Museum in Melbourne, Fla., and checks out trucks.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.sub-title: Emmett Show and Shine
programme.desc: Dennis heads to Idaho for the Emmett Show and Shine; radio upgrades for classic cars.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.sub-title: Adirondack Nationals 34
programme.desc: From the rare and exotic to the extreme and wacky, Dennis Gage spotlights all things automotive, traveling the country to find the cars and events that spark America's love affair with the automobile.
